job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pstrongCore Responsibilities and DutiesstrongppWe are seeking a dynamic individual interested in working hard getting stuff done and having fun along the way someone who will bring passion and a sense of ownership to the core responsibilities listed below and any other tasks required by the manager aimed at helping BLDG25 continue its exciting growth In this position you will build machine learning models and deliverimplement analytics solutions that create value for our customers and ensure sustained customer satisfaction with the technical services implemented You will be accountable for solving problems and engineering solutions that bring experiences to life ranging from the envisioning of new solutions to prototyping and through to implementationppbrpullistronguData Cleaning and AnalysisustrongnbspnbspPerform exploratory data analysis and statistical modeling with timeseries industrial data Applying excellent data conditioning methods to derive data health metrics and deliver scalable data frameslilistronguModeling and ResearchustrongnbspnbspResearch neural network architectures to propose appropriate modelstechniques and have experience in implementing and training these models for the available client data delivering scalable models to provide realtime outputlilistronguModel Deployment and DevOpsustrongnbspnbspIntegrate ML models to cloud and onprem platform and perform solution feasibility model impact deployment risks and data gap analysisliulpbrppstrongThe Special You BringnbspnbspYoustrongpulliBring a sense of excitement and curiosity and get things done every dayliliBring a sense of customer empathy and devotion to high qualityliliBring problemsolving aptitude and strong math skills eg statistics algebraliliWant to make a longterm commitment to join the family and grow with a growing businessliliAre kind mature hardworking energetic and enjoy delivering excellence while having fun doing itliulpbrppstrongQualificationsstrongpulliBScBA in Computer Science Engineering or relevant field 2 years of experience or Graduate degree in Data Science or other quantitative fields 1 year of experience is preferredliliTechnical expertise regarding data models database design development data mining and segmentation techniquesliliExtensive experience in developing and implementing deep neural network models CNN RNN VAE CVAE etc using popular tools PyTorch Keras TensorFlow for sequence modeling anomaly detection and computer vision problemsnbspliliExperience applying time series analysis and forecasting LSTM ARIMA SARIMAX etc to industrial process dataliliExperience working with python and its statistical and machine learning modules NumPy pandas scikitlearn SciPy will give you a jump startliliExperience with data extraction and cleaning from unstructured sources and expertise in enhancing the available data using synthetic data generation techniquesliliSolid understanding of data structures algorithms computability and complexity and computer architectureliliSolid understanding of probability statistics distributions and linear algebraliliKnowledge building pipelines and ETLs to process big data using tools such as Hadoop Spark Kafka etcliliExperience with onprem or cloud ML deployment eg Docker ML Flow PythonliliExperience using data visualization and reporting tools eg PowerBIliliPrevious experience in predictive analytics solutions is an assetliul
